title: Kwiz Computing Technologies Limited
text:
At Kwiz Research Services, we build customized data and software solutions for business and research. Our goal is to accelerate the adoption of data driven decision processes, integrating the best technologies for data management, processing and reporting.
We:

title: Enterprise Applications and Big Data Solutions
text:
Kwiz Computing Technologies builds and maintains R shiny Applications and Algorithms for Computational and Enteprise workflows. We develop lean applications optimized for scale and security




 We:



Build Sky Computing Infrastructure


Build Dashboards and Interactive Web Pages


Consult on and Implement Advanced Statistical Models


Debug and Customize existing R Shiny Applications/Workflows


Create and Optimize Big Data Pipelines and Computational Workflows




 You Get:



Robust Multicloud applications


Lean Modular Architecture


Fast Prototyping


Agile Teams

title: Home
text:
Research and Software Solutions
What we do:
Software Solutions

build R/Shiny web applications for enterprise that;

integrate API calls to provision, deploy and manage secure and scalable cloud (AWS) resources
integrate Databases and solutions written in other popular languages (e.g Python)

design and implement algorithms to automate Management and High Performance Mathematical Computing workflows
author and publish with scientific markdown high-quality (e.g articles, reports, websites, blogs, … in HTML, PDF, MS Word, …)
deploy static and interactive web solutions created in R

Research Solutions

consult on research methodologies and evaluation metrics
reproducible data processing, analysis and the synthesis and presentation of results

title: Training
text: We offer training to Individuals and Institutions on data analysis and software development integrating R programming and other software platforms including Python, Javascript, CSS, HTML, React and Database solutions.

title: Kwiz Computing Technologies Limited
text:
KwizCoTech is a software company purposed to solve business and research problems in complex environments by designing algorithms and interactive applications to facilitate and automate high-performance computational and business workflows.


Value proposition
Data science & Analytics:
IT & Networking:
Web & Software Development:
simple intuitive interfaces: built on top of heterogeneous cloud infrastructure (sky computing): providing robust, flexible and low cost solutions: in an automated, secure, interactive and unified abstraction layer: powered by R
modular infrastructure: for lean applications, quick prototypes and agile feature integration.
efficient scalable solutions fit for your needs
Capacity Development:
empower individuals and teams through training: demystifying the R programming language for statistical computing and software development
focus on: R, Automated workflows with R, Interacting with Web Technologies in R, Building Web Technologies with R, Integrating other programming languages to expand R functionality, and collaboration and reproducibility




 Our Solutions 







Software

Research

Training

integrate Databases and solutions written in other popular languages (e.g Python)

author and publish with scientific markdown high-quality (e.g articles, reports, websites, blogs, … in HTML, PDF, MS Word, …)
deploy static and interactive web solutions created in R



consult on research methodologies and evaluation metrics
reproducible data processing, analysis and the synthesis and presentation of results


We train Individuals and groups on:

R programming language for Data Analysis
R programming language for Software Development







 The Team 






Kwizera Jean Victor: Co-Founder, CEO

Kwizera is an R Developer, Data Scientist, Researcher; with a background in Actuarial Science and Data Science, and with over 6 years experience Programming in and around the R programming language. He is passionate about open source technologies, mathematical computing and research.
Kwizera has worked in research and business consulting, including:

modeling and simulating ecological processes and financial trading strategies,
evaluating sample data biases,
building forest inventory and climate models,
analyzing credit markets

building interactive dashboards and
automating workflows

He is a problem solver with keen interest in Automation, Integration, Mathematical Computing and Cloud Solutions.



 jeankwizera@kwizresearch.com







Iragena Vincent De Paul: Co-Founder, COO

Iragena is a graduate of Economics from the University of Nairobi. He is passionate about Project Management, operations and policy development. He also has interests in software and music and he invests some of his time developing electronic music.



 vindepaul@kwizresearch.com

title: Home
section: We use the R programming Language as the backbone for our development, leveraging its robust suit of libraries to create efficient highly-scalable solutions for high perfomance computing, fast prototyping and productionization, seamlessly integrate cloud solutions and other programming languages.
